snippet.title: The Amazing Angry Dotty! [Forest gameplay video]
snippet.description:
Starting a new deckbuilder run is exciting as you never know what you'll get. Sometimes you're given an amazing item on the very first chest! Angry is a double-edged status but there's no downside if you win every fight super fast, something Dotty the Dog already excels at.

Wishlist or join Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422190/Fuzz_Force_Spook_Squad/

Fuzz Force: Spook Squad is a fresh take on the deckbuilding genre. Customise your Dice-Powered weapons to defeat an legion of spooky foes. Navigate a board game world full of battles and treasure with the mission of capturing the nefarious PolterPrince.
